name: Star Traveller (StarKnightStudio)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Star Traveller is an Arcade Shooter inspired by the early space themed video games. Inside a retro futuristic space ship cockpit, the player flies through asteroid fields and shoots them with a laser beam to avoid being hit. The radar shows the position of the ship and the asteroids and allows the player to prepare their strategy.

It's a simple but addictive arcade game where the challenge is not only on finishing it, but on making the perfect game and get the highest score by destroying the asteroids as late as possible.

At the end of the game a very special reward awaits the player...

CONTROLS

MOVEMENT: W,A,S,D / Arrow Keys / D-Pad / Analog Stick

FIRE: Space / Fire Button

FULL SCREEN: F Key

EXIT GAME: Escape
